endpoints.description: Run a single prediction on the model

parameters.name: task

param_schema.description: Task to perform: transcribe or translate to another language.

parameters.description: Task to perform: transcribe or translate to another language.

parameters.name: hf_token

param_schema.title: Hf Token
param_schema.description: Provide a hf.co/settings/token for Pyannote.audio to diarise the audio clips. You need to agree to the terms in 'https://huggingface.co/pyannote/speaker-diarization-3.1' and 'https://huggingface.co/pyannote/segmentation-3.0' first.

parameters.description: Provide a hf.co/settings/token for Pyannote.audio to diarise the audio clips. You need to agree to the terms in 'https://huggingface.co/pyannote/speaker-diarization-3.1' and 'https://huggingface.co/pyannote/segmentation-3.0' first.

parameters.name: language

param_schema.description: Language spoken in the audio, specify 'None' to perform language detection.

parameters.description: Language spoken in the audio, specify 'None' to perform language detection.

parameters.name: timestamp

param_schema.description: Whisper supports both chunked as well as word level timestamps.

parameters.description: Whisper supports both chunked as well as word level timestamps.

parameters.name: batch_size

param_schema.title: Batch Size
param_schema.description: Number of parallel batches you want to compute. Reduce if you face OOMs.

parameters.description: Number of parallel batches you want to compute. Reduce if you face OOMs.

parameters.name: diarise_audio

param_schema.title: Diarise Audio
param_schema.description: Use Pyannote.audio to diarise the audio clips. You will need to provide hf_token below too.

parameters.description: Use Pyannote.audio to diarise the audio clips. You will need to provide hf_token below too.
